title: Payakorn Sorn Ruk
overview: Rosita has the ability to see the future when she touches rose. One day, she takes part in a show where six people hold a rose in their hands, which Rosita then takes in her hands to see the future of each of them. Taking all six roses at the same time, the heroine sees herself hugging and kissing the main character - Tirut... as well as blood and many other frightening visions of the future of the owners of these roses. She's in shock. Noticing her strange reaction, Rosita is asked what she saw, but she said nothing. After the show, one of the six tries to kill her. Rosita has to temporarily move into the house of Tirut, because they swear at every meeting and they are considered enemies. Who wants to kill Rosita and will the visions of Her own future come true?
